title: League patcher update fail
body: Everytime an update comes out my league patcher doesn't update properly. I am forced to constantly uninstall and reinstall league to get the game to update and it keeps getting more and more annoying. It will hit 33% then fail and tell me to check the logs. I'm not a coding expert so I have no idea what I'm looking for in these logs. After i hit retry it calculated differences then fails up update again. Rinse and repeat. Anyone know how to fix it without having to uninstall/reinstall constantly?

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot and information, that gave a lot of context to help!  At this phase, the patcher is downloading files to update your game but is being blocked.  This is usually due to a bad or slow connection problem failing to grab those assets.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and fix this for good!  Let me know if you have any questions!
this seems to be a common issue, what does it take to get a response?
Have had the same problem all day long, and its not my connection. My connection is fine. I submitted a ticket 10 hours ago and have yet to get a response. So pissed.
